description: [Ostel](https://ostel.co) is part of the Open Secure Telephony Network (OSTN) by the [Guardian-Project](https://guardianproject.info/). The goal is promoting free, open protocols, standards and software and to power end-to-end encrypted voice communications on mobile devices and desktop computers. They use standards such as SRTP, ZRTP, and SIP(over TLS). Clients are available for nearly every platform.
name: Ostel
